seniority_level.evidence: Total experience 6-7 years (relevant 4-5 years) aligns with senior level expectations.

job_family.evidence: Title explicitly states Data Engineer and responsibilities focus on data pipelines and integration.

sub_specialty.evidence: Job description mentions both batch and real‑time processing, predictive modeling, and search applications without a single narrow focus.

leadership_expectation.evidence: No direct reports or people‑management duties are described; role is centered on technical delivery.

primary_cloud.evidence: Mandatory skills list Azure Databricks, Azure DevOps, Azure Blob; title includes "Azure".

secondary_clouds.evidence: No other cloud platforms are mentioned in the posting or extraction.

processing_paradigm.evidence: Description explicitly references both batch and real‑time processing.

orchestrator_category.evidence: No orchestration tools (Airflow, Luigi, etc.) are referenced.

storage_layer.evidence: Azure Databricks is commonly used with Delta Lake (lakehouse) architecture; no explicit data‑warehouse product is listed.

remote_restriction.evidence: Location restriction is "Kochi, Kerala, India" and geo restriction type is specific_countries (IN).

timezone_focus.evidence: Job is limited to India, implying Indian Standard Time zone.

relocation_required.evidence: No relocation language is present; location is fixed to Kochi.

h1b_friendly.evidence: Visa sponsorship is not mentioned and the role is India‑based.

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No reference to OPT/CPT eligibility; typical for non‑US locations.

citizenship_required.evidence: No citizenship or work‑authorization requirements are stated.

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Employment type and contract type are both listed as not_mentioned.

benefits_level.evidence: Benefits array is empty and no benefit language appears in the posting.

growth_path_clarity.evidence: The posting does not discuss career progression or growth tracks.

mentorship_signals.evidence: No mentorship program or senior‑mentor language is present.

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No promotion or advancement language appears in the description.

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers or lateral moves.

career_tracks_available.evidence: No explicit reference to IC, management, specialist, or architect tracks.

requirement_strictness.evidence: A long list of mandatory hard and soft skills with no nice‑to‑have items indicates a strict requirement set.

scope_definition.evidence: Job description focuses specifically on data engineering tasks without blending other roles.

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Required skill set aligns with a senior‑level data engineer having 6‑7 years of experience.
